bio: Marauder is an Orc man. Marauder isn't his name, but rather just a term that descibes his fighting style. He wears Orcish armor, and wields an Orcish sword and shield. He is a bandit who hangs around with several other bandits around Bleak Falls Tower. Bleak Falls Tower is in between the town of Riverwood down below to the east, and Bleak Falls Barrow in the snowy Brittleshin Hills to the west.
name: Marauder
